ContentText: 3.Choose the newest release (2.3.0 in my case)
4.Choose the newest package type (Pre-built for Hadoop 2.7 or later in my case)
6.Set the environment variables:SPARK_HOME (eg: D:\Spark\spark-2.3.0-bin-hadoop2.7) and PATH + (eg:%SPARK_HOME% in)
7.Next to download winutils.exe, click this link :'https://github.com/steveloughran/winutils/blob/master/hadoop-2.7.1/bin/winutils.exe?raw=true'
8.Move the winutils.exe file to the bin folder inside new folder(eg:winutils)
